name: Fatal Dimensions: That's All Faux!
description:
Just jump in and play our short goofy game about being trapped in a labyrinth and making moral choices about 4 fine, animated friends.

FEATURES:

- Nonviolent conflict resolution.

- Violent conflict resolution.

- A quipping companion.

- A transformation, in more ways than one.

- Classic adventure game statistics.

- No mazes or puzzles!

- Ability checks!

CREDITS:

Programming/Design - MonsHorizon
Writing - TeaOfTheMoon
Jokes/Character Concepts - Mons Horizon & TeaOfTheMoon
Art - MonsHorizon (Edited With GIMP)
Music - MonsHorizon (Tracks 1 & 2 Created Using Online Omnichord)
Music - TeaOfTheMoon (Tracks 3, 4, & 5 Created Using Signal) 

Made with Twine, written in Harlowe, and using the Harlowe Audio Library.

Thanks for playing!
